hero.title: Connect with AI Coding Tools
hero.description: Viber.vn is a gateway that helps you access and use Augment Code, Claude Code easily. Vietnamese documentation, 24/7 support.

connect.title: Connect
connect.description: Gateway connects you with AI coding tools like Augment Code and Claude Code through a single access point.

simple.title: Simple
simple.description: Vietnamese documentation, step-by-step guides, easy to setup and use.

support.title: Support
support.description: Active Telegram community, support team ready to help 24/7.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.step1: Visit viber.vn and create an account
quickStart.step2: Get your API key from the dashboard
quickStart.step3: Install the extension and enter your API key

community.title: Community
community.description: Join our Telegram group to chat about coding, vibe code, AI tools, and everything related to programming.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Access gateway to connect with AI coding tools

tools.title: AI Coding Tools
tools.subtitle: Discover the leading AI-powered coding tools
tools.note: Gateway only provides connection and payment support. The tools above are developed by Augment Code Inc. and Anthropic.
